label: 中世
本: Capital and Countryside in Japan, 300-1180:  Japanese Historians Interpreted in English . Cornell University East Asia Program . 2006
説明文: the middle ages, the medieval world—it is a historiographical term rather than a historical one. Related terms include “medieval relations” (chûseiteki shokankei  中世的諸関係) and “medieval feudal relations” (chûsei hôkenteki shokankei 封建的諸関係).
